Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: It is also suggested that the blockade of K ( + ) - channels sensitive to these blockers is not sufficient to prevent morphine - induced hypoactivity whereas morphine - induced hyperactivity seems to be connected to both quinine - and 4 - aminopyridine - sensitive K ( + ) - channels .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| K (+) channels |
| Morphine |
| Quinine |
| 4-aminopyridine |

In the paragraph, "K (+) channels" refers to potassium ion channels that carry a positive charge. "Morphine" is an opioid drug, and "quinine" and "4-aminopyridine" are both chemicals used as blockers for specific types of potassium ion channels.
